alert.note: Alert for Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CUSTER COUNTY THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Custer State Park, or 11 miles east of Custer, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eastern Custer State Park around 505 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills
